sn47.34:1.1: “Cattarome, bhikkhave, satipatthana bhavita bahulikata apara param gamanaya samvattanti.
sn47.34:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaye kayanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam;
sn47.34:2.5: dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn47.34:2.6: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaro satipatthana bhavita bahulikata apara param gamanaya samvattanti”ti.
